add_library(customGlew INTERFACE)
#set_target_properties(customGlew PROPERTIES LINKER_LANGUAGE C)

if (MSVC)
	target_compile_definitions(customGlew INTERFACE "GLEW_STATIC")
    target_include_directories(customGlew INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/include/")
    if (CMAKE_SIZEOF_VOID_P EQUAL 8)
        target_link_libraries(customGlew INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Release/x64/glew32s.lib")
    else()
        target_link_libraries(customGlew INTERFACE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Release/Win32/glew32s.lib")
    endif()

    message(STATUS "Lib file: ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/lib/Release/x64/glew32s.lib")
else()
    find_package(GLEW REQUIRED)
    target_include_directories(customGlew INTERFACE ${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIR})
    target_link_libraries(customGlew INTERFACE ${GLEW_LIBRARIES})
endif()

find_package(OpenGL REQUIRED)
target_include_directories(customGlew INTERFACE ${OPENGL_INCLUDE_DIRS})
target_link_libraries(customGlew INTERFACE ${OPENGL_LIBRARIES})
